phrs.translation: 释放你的创造力, 释放你的创造力比尔·盖茨, 比尔•盖茨, 比尔·盖茨
释放杀手级应用, 释放的杀手级的应用
释放M在你的心, 在你的心里释放中号

sentences.sentence: So these lines of defense prevent us from unleashing broken code on the world.
sentences.translation: 因此，这些防线防止我们把有问题的代码送出去。

sentences.sentence: He sees his job as removing barriers within the company and unleashing its talents.
sentences.translation: 他把工作看作是扫除公司里的障碍，释放人才。

sentences.sentence: Getting to the truth of a person and unleashing their natural talents is vital.
sentences.translation: 发掘人的真相并且释放其蕴藏的潜力至关重要。
